Victim reported he was followed into his residence and robbed at gunpoint by an unknown blackman wearing all black, black ski mask, dreadlocks and armed with a black handgun. Thesuspect took the victim's wallet and backpack and ran out of the apartment, getting into thepassenger side of a dark-colored crossover SUV that drove off.

The Greenbelt Police Department’s Criminal Investigative Unit is currently investigating a criticalmissing juvenile (age only) identified as Deandre Charles Stevenson. Deandre is a 13-year-oldAfrican American male, approximately 5’3 in height and 110 lbs. Deandre was last seen on03/22/23 at approximately 0845 hours, leaving his residence located at 9100 block ofEdmonston Terrace Greenbelt, MD. Deandre was last seen wearing a black ski mask, greenpolo, black hoodie, and tan pants.
